abilities.name: Battle-Scarred
abilities.description: This unit has survived damage 9 times, it gains +3/+3 and Lifesteal

abilities.name: Last Stand
abilities.description: If this is your only unit, it has +2/+2

body.raw:
# Nine of Wands

Wounded but not broken, standing ready for one more battle.

*"The last warrior standing writes the history."*
